tweet_text: @meelar @AlexFischCC @mateosfo @RicardoLara4CA It probably depends on the place. A lot of these fires are once in a century events and the ecosystem is going to come back as something different. It’s probably hard to know what the risk of recurrence is in some places.

text_en: I dream of it! Often! I am in love with those cattle. Seriously. It's very strange. I'm a city boy but my love for them is to the stars and back. I dont understand it but that doesn't really bother me.

@RJ_McReedy @LukewSavage That is a ridiculous statement
